comment: " Mercenaries and auxiliaries are useless and dangerous ; and if one holds his state based on these arms , he will stand neither firm nor safe ; for they are disunited , ambitious , and without discipline , unfaithful , valiant before friends , cowardly before enemies ... " - Machiavelli
